import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import useSWR from "swr"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import Link from "next/link"; import { gql, hasuraUserClient } from "../../lib/hasura-user-client"; const getProjectsIds = gql` { Project { id Title Description } } `; const GetUsers = gql` query MyQuery { User { id Name Domain Avatar user_projects { project_id } user_projects_aggregate { aggregate { count } } } } `; const GetUsersbyproject = gql` query MyQuery($id: Int!) { User(where: { _not: { user_projects: { project_id: { _eq: $id } } } }) { id Name Domain Avatar user_projects { project_id } user_projects_aggregate { aggregate { count } } } } `; const GetUsersWorkingOnthisProject = gql` query MyQuery($id: Int!) { User(where: { user_projects: { project_id: { _eq: $id } } }) { id Name Domain Avatar user_projects { project_id } user_projects_aggregate { aggregate { count } } } } `; const GetProjectByID = gql` query GetProjectByID($id: Int!) { Project_by_pk(id: $id) { id Title Description company_name income } } `; const assignu = gql` mutation MyMutation($project_id: Int!, $user_id: Int!) { insert_user_project_one( object: { project_id: $project_id, user_id: $user_id } ) { project_id user_id } } `; export const getStaticPaths = async () => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { Project } = await hasura.request(getProjectsIds); return { paths: Project.map(({ id }) => ({ params: { id: id.toString(), }, })), fallback: false, }; }; export const getStaticProps = async ({ params }) => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { id } = params; const initialData = await hasura.request(GetProjectByID, { id }); const dataU = await hasura.request(GetUsers); const dataz = await hasura.request(GetUsersbyproject, { id }); const dataf = await hasura.request(GetUsersWorkingOnthisProject, { id }); return { props: { initialData, dataU, dataz, dataf, }, revalidate: 1, }; }; export default function AssignP({ initialData, dataU, dataz, dataf }) { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { query } = useRouter(); const router = useRouter(); const { idP } = query; const { handleSubmit, register, control, errors, formState: { isSubmitting }, defaultValues: { ...defaultValues }, } = useForm(); console.log(dataz.User); const assign = async ({ id }) => { console.log(id); if ( confirm(`are you sure you want to assign the project to this employee? `) ) { try { const { insert_user_project_one } = await hasura.request(assignu, { project_id: query.id, user_id: id, }); router.push(`/Project/List`); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } else return null; }; return (
